64274.「おおっ！\n そこにおるのは <pc>じゃな！\n おぬしを ずっと待っていた:
Oh, there you are! You sure know how to make
someone wait.

64275.「いつぞやは 乾いていたワシを 助けてくれて\n たいへん 感謝しておる。\n:
I am very grateful that you helped me out
of my dry spell the other day. Thanks to you,
I am back home safe and sound.

64277.「ワシが アラハギーロの王だと 主張しても\n 誰も 信じてくれんのじゃよ。\n:
My claims of being king of Al-Ahagiro fall on
deaf ears... Soldiers, even ministers treat me
like some kind of monster...

64278.「こんな姿では しょうがないことと\n わかってはおるんじゃが……\n ワシ く:
I know this looks bad, but... I'm sorry!
I feel just terrible and worthless!

64279.「そこでじゃ！ おぬしに頼みたいことがある。: So! I have a favor I must ask of you.

64280.「干からびかけて 砂漠の南部をさまよっていた時\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
I was wandering in the southern desert when a
monster called Evil Ganesh inadvertently
stole my precious king's scepter from me.

64281.「王家の紋章が 入っておって\n アラハギーロの王に 代々 受け継がれる\n 黄:
Passed down from generation to generation to
the kings of Al-Ahagiro, it's a golden scepter
that bears the royal crest.

64282.「それを <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から\n 取り戻してきてたもれ！\n:
Please get it back from that Evil Ganesh!
Well? Will you do that for me?

64283.「おおっ。ありがたや！\n さすがは ワシの命の恩人じゃ。\n では よろしく頼:
Oh, thank you! You really are a life saver.
I'm counting on you!

64284.「アラハギーロ王の証である 王しゃくさえあれば\n ワシが この国の王であると:
If only I had the royal scepter... I could
then prove I am truly the king of this land
and get out here!

64285.「おお。ありがたや……と 言いたいところじゃが\n おぬし 他の者からの頼まれご:
Ah, thank you, but... it seems you already
have your hands quite full with other requests
right now.

64286.「それらを 速やかに片付けて\n 急いで 戻ってまいるのじゃ。\n ワシ ここで:
Please take care of those first, but hurry
back. I'll be waiting.

64287.「そ…そんな！ おぬしなら 引き受けてくれると\n 思っておったのに……。:
W...what?! And here I thought you'd actually
help me...

64288.「気が変わったら 戻ってきてほしいのう。\n おぬししか ワシの頼みを\n 聞い:
Please come back after reconsidering. You
really are my only hope...

64289.「そこにおるのは <pc>じゃな！\n また 来てくれると 信じておったぞ。:
There you are, <pc>!
I knew you'd come around!

64290.「改めて おぬしに頼みたいんじゃ！: Once again, I'm asking for your help!

64291.「干からびかけて 砂漠の南部をさまよっていた時\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME:
I was wandering in the southern desert when a
monster called Evil Ganesh inadvertently
stole my precious king's scepter from me.

64292.「王家の紋章が 入っておってな……\n アラハギーロの王に 代々 受け継がれる\:
Passed down from generation to generation to
the kings of Al-Ahagiro, it's a golden scepter
that bears the royal crest...

64293.「それを <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から\n 取り戻してきてたもれ！\n:
Please get it back from that Evil Ganesh!
Well? Will you do that for me?

64294.「アラハギーロ王の証である 王しゃくさえあれば\n ワシが この国の王であると:
If only I had the royal scepter... I could
then prove I am truly the king of this land
and get out here!

64295.「ワシから 王しゃくを盗んだ\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n アラハ:
The Evil Ganesh who stole the scepter
from me must be in the southern part
of the Al-Ahagiro Region!

64296.「その <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を倒して\n ワシの王しゃくを 取り戻し:
Go defeat that Evil Ganesh and bring it back
to me!

64297.「ワシ ここで待っておるからの。\n 頼んだぞ <pc>！:
I'll be waiting here. I'm counting on you,
<pc>!

64298.「はわっ <pc>！\n ……その顔は もしや ワシの王しゃくを\n 取り戻して:
You're back! That look on your face says
that you brought back my scepter.

64299.「では…… さっそく\n ワシの王しゃくを 渡してくれるかのう？<yesno><: So, then... would you please hand it to me?<yesno><close>

64300.<pc>は わかめ王子に\n黄金の王しゃくを 渡した。:
<pc> gave the Golden King Scepter to
the King Kelp.

64301.「おお！ これをふたたび\n 手にすることができようとは……感無量じゃ。\n こ:
Oh... to feel the scepter in my hands again...
What a wonderful feeling. Now that I have it,
I can get out of here!!

64302.「うるさいぞ！ おとなしくしていろ！: Hey, you! Keep it quiet in there!

64303.「おお！ ちょうどよい。\n 見張りの兵士よ。カブースと アブタルを\n 急ぎ:
Oh, just in time! You, soldier. Bring Kabusu
and Abutar here right away.

64304.「貴様！ 魔物の分際で 何をエラそうに。\n 大臣と兵士長を 呼びつけようとは！:
You damn monster! How dare you?! You really
believe they will come and see you?!

64305.「早く 呼んでまいれ！ 急ぐのじゃ！\n さもないと ヌルヌルした ワシのわかめ:
Get them over here, now! Or I'll stuff your
mouth full of my slimy seaweed!!

64307.「いったい なにごとだ！？: What on earth is going on?!

64308.「来たな ふたりとも。\n これから ワシこそ アラハギーロの王じゃと\n 証明:
Good, you're both here. I will now prove to
you that I am the king!

64309.「ジャジャーン！\n これが 目に入らんかー！: Ta-da! Take a look at THIS!

64310.「我は 第７９代 国王ムーニス。\n 千年の栄光に 彩られし\n アラハギーロ王:
I am Moonis, the 79th King of Al-Ahagiro.
The glorious kingdom of a thousand years!

64311.「今までの非礼は 大目に見よう。\n さっ 早く ここから 出すのじゃ。:
I will no longer tolerate any more disrespect.
Release me from here at once!

64312.「貴様…… どこで\n その王しゃくを 手に入れた！？: You damn monster... where did you get that?!

64313.「おおかた ムーニス王から盗み取ったのだろう。\n いやしい魔物め……。\n ふ:
Stolen from King Moonis, no doubt. You dirty
monster... now I'm worried about the king...

64314.「な なんじゃと……。\n これでも 信じぬというのか。\n なんという 恩知ら:
W-what...? You still don't believe me? You
really are ungrateful.

64315.「ええい アブタル！ おぬしがちょくちょく\n 調理室のチーズを 盗み食いしてい:
Hey, Abutar! I've kept quiet about you
stealing cheese from the kitchen!

64316.「な！ なぜ そのことを知っている！: Hey! How do you know that?!

64317.「カブース！ 昔 ポエム入りの\n 寒いラブレターを 侍女に 書いておったこと\:
And Kabusu! You wouldn't mind if I told the
whole castle you've been writing loveletters
to the maids, would you?!

64319.「いや し…しかし そのことは\n 私と王だけしか 知らぬはず……。:
No, but... only the king and I know about
that...

64321.「本当じゃ！ まだ 信じられぬようなら\n おぬしの こっぱずかしい過去を\n:
I am! And if you still don't believe me, I
have plenty more things I can say to
embarrass you!

64323.「わかったなら さっさと\n ワシを ここから出すのじゃ！\n ただちに じゃ！:
Understood? Then, get me out of here!
Right now!

64325.「ふう。<pc>。\n おぬしのおかげで ワシが ムーニスじゃと\n ようやく:
Whew... thanks to you, <pc>,
they finally believe that I am Moonis.

64326.「おぬしには 礼をせねばな。\n この後 玉座の間まで\n 足を運んでもらえるか:
I must thank you for help. Please come to the
throne room when you are able.

64327.「では 待っておるぞ。: I will be waiting there for you.

64329.「命を助けられたばかりではなく\n ワシが 王だと認めさせる\n 手助けまで し:
Not only did you save my life, but you helped
everyone realize that I am truly the king...

64330.「おぬしには 本当に 世話になったのう。\n これは 約束した礼じゃ！ 受け取っ:
I am truly in your debt. Here is your reward
that I promised. Please take it!

64331.「ムーニス王 今こそ お聞かせください。\n 何が どうなって そのような お姿:
I think now is the time to tell us, your
Majesty. What happened to make you turn
into a monster?

64332.「カブース…… これから話すことを\n 心して 聞いてほしい。\n あの戦争で起:
I want you to listen very carefully. This is
the whole story of what happened in that
dreadful war...

64333.「あの魔族との戦争に ワシと\n ゴリウス兵士長率いる アラハギーロ軍は\n 必:
The Al-Ahagiro army, lead by Gorias and I,
fought valiantly against the demons.

64334.「しかし 奮戦むなしく こてんぱんにされ\n 魔族によって 捕らえられてしまった:
But it was in vain... we were beaten quite
badly and got captured. We were all prepared
to die.

64335.「ところが 魔族の将は ワシらを殺すことはせず\n 皆を それぞれ 魔物の姿に変:
However, the demon general did not kill us...
Instead, he transformed each of us into
monsters!

64336.「そして 魔物に変えられた兵士たちは\n いずこかへ 連れ去られてしまった……。:
And those soldiers, who were now monsters,
were taken away...

64337.「ただ ワシはこの通り わかめ王子の姿にされ\n 砂漠の日差しにより 干からびて:
But, as you can see, I became a King Kelp and
was dried out by the hot sun. They didn't
notice me, so I survived.

64339.「そうじゃな。……しかし どこへ\n なんの目的で 連れ去ったかは わからんが\:
Yes, indeed... I don't know where they were
taken or why, but I'm certain they are all
still alive.

64340.「ワシはこれから 国を挙げて 情報を集め\n なんとか 行方不明の者たちを\n:
I will gather information from all around the
country to see if I can't find them.

64341.「<pc>。おぬしにも また\n 何か 協力を依頼することになるやもしれぬ。\n:
I may ask for your cooperation once more,
<pc>. If I do, I hope you will
assist me.

64342.「おお <pc>。\n わざわざ ワシのことを心配して\n 会いに来てくれたのか:
Oh <pc>. You came all the way out
here to see me because you're worried about
me?

64343.「このような姿じゃから この玉座の間に\n こもりっきりなんじゃが\n オリの中:
This is why I'm stuck in this throne Room, but
it's a lot better than being in a cage.

64344.「じゃが このままの姿だと 行方不明の者たちを\n 探すにも 支障があるのう。\:
But in my current state, I can't help looking
for those who are missing. I must revert back
to human form as soon as possible.

64345.「<pc>。近いうち\n ふたたび 協力を頼むことになるやもしれぬ。\n そのと:
<pc>. We may ask for your cooperation
again in the near future. I will ask for your
cooperation again in the near future.

64889.「ぬっ！？ 何を申すか おぬし。\n それは 正真正銘 ワシのものじゃ！\n こ:
Huh?! What's this nonsense?! That scepter
belongs to me! Give it to me, now!<yesno><close>
